com.meteorcode.pathway.script

Class ScriptEnvironment

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.meteorcode.pathway.script.ScriptEnvironment

  • public class ScriptEnvironment
extends java.lang.Object
    ScriptEnvironment is an abstraction of mappings that scripts will have to use in order to have a consistent API. I.e. you would map the script variable "game" to perhaps an instance of "Game", and if the ScriptEnvironment is working correctly, you should be able to pass it to a ScriptContainer and all scripts that use the word "game" are referring to your in-java Game.

      • ScriptEnvironment

        public ScriptEnvironment()
        Constructor for a blank ScriptEnvironment.

      • ScriptEnvironment

        public ScriptEnvironment(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> initialBindings)
        Constructor for a ScriptEnvironment with initial bindings.
        Parameters:
        initialBindings - A mapping of variable names to objects that will be used as the initial bindings for the ScriptEnvironment.

      • ScriptEnvironment

        public ScriptEnvironment(java.lang.String onLink)
        Constructor for a ScriptEnvironment with no initial bindings and an onLink script.
        Parameters:
        onLink - A String containing a script to be executed when the ScriptEnvironment is linked to a ScriptContainer.

      • ScriptEnvironment

        public ScriptEnvironment(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> initialBindings,
                 java.lang.String onLink)
        Constructor for a ScriptEnvironment with initial bindings and an onLink script.
        Parameters:
        initialBindings - A mapping of variable names to objects that will be used as the initial bindings for the ScriptEnvironment.
        onLink - A String containing a script to be executed when the ScriptEnvironment is linked to a ScriptContainer.

    • Method Detail

      • addBinding

        public void addBinding(java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.Object variable)
                throws ScriptException
        Adds a new binding to the ScriptEnvironment. If the ScriptEnvironment is linked to any ScriptContainers, this will automatically inject the new binding into that ScriptContainer.
        Parameters:
        name - the name to bind to the variable
        variable - the value of the new variable
        Throws:
        ScriptException - in the event of an injection failure

      • addBindings

        public void addBindings(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> newBindings)
                 throws ScriptException
        Adds new bindings to the ScriptEnvironment. If the ScriptEnvironment is linked to any ScriptContainers, this will automatically inject the new binding into that ScriptContainer.
        Parameters:
        newBindings - a mapping of Strings to Objects to use as new bindings.
        Throws:
        ScriptException - in the event of an injection failure

      • getBindings

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getBindings()

      • link

        public void link(ScriptContainer container)
          throws ScriptException
        Links this environment with a ScriptContainer, injecting this environment's bindings into the container. The onLink script will be executed if it is present.

        If the target ScriptContainer is already linked to this environment, this method silently does nothing.

        Parameters:
        container - the target ScriptContainer to link with.
        Throws:
        ScriptException - if an error occurs during binding injection

      • unlink

        public void unlink(ScriptContainer container)
            throws ScriptException
        Unlinks this environment from a linked ScriptContainer, removing the bindings from the container's execution environment.

        If the target ScriptContainer is not linked to this environment, this method silently does nothing.

        Parameters:
        container - the target ScriptContainer to link with
        Throws:
        ScriptException - if an error occurs during binding removal
